data.name: CustomerPausedJobEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as the owner of {0}. Your group {0} with Id {1} is currently offboarded from Group Membership Management (GMM) due to one of the following reasons:
• Group Owner Requested a Pause for more than 30 days. • Source or Destination group has been deleted by group owner • No response from group owner about membership adding/removal threshold hitting
If you believe this group should be continued managed by Group Membership Management (GMM), please reach out to GMM support before {2} to restore the current onboarding details. Otherwise, you may submit a new GMM onboarding request after the deadline if GMM is still needed.
Please feel free to contact GMMSupport if you have any questions.
Thank you, GMM Team

data.name: NoDataEmailContent
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group {0}.
The group sync will be PAUSED since there is no data to sync to group {0}.
Please reach out to your GMM team to get this issue resolved.
Regards, GMM Team

data.name: NoDataEmailSubject
data.value: Group Membership Management - No data found for group {0}

data.name: SyncCompletedEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group, {0}.
GMM onboarding is requested by {4} to systematically manage the group membership based on the pre-set rules. Please visit {5} to learn more about GMM.
The group {0} with Id: {1} has completed its initial sync. Added {2} users and removed {3} users.
This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to the onboarding requestor {4} for any specific questions about this group and reach out to {6} for GMM inquires.
Regards, GMM Team

data.name: SyncDisabledNoGroupEmailBody
data.value: The sync has been disabled because the group with object Id: {0} doesn't exist. This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to {1} if you have further questions about GMM.

data.name: SyncDisabledNoOwnerEmailBody
data.value:
The sync has been disabled because GMM is not an owner of the group with object Id: {0}.
This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to {1} if you have further questions about GMM.

data.name: SyncDisabledNoSourceGroupEmailBody
data.value: The sync for group {0} has been disabled because the source group with object Id: {1} doesn't exist. This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to {2} if you have further questions about GMM.

data.name: SyncDisabledNoValidGroupIds
data.value:
The sync has been disabled because the object ID(s) {0} are not valid GUIDs and do not refer to valid groups.
This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to {1} if you have further questions about GMM.

data.name: SyncJobDisabledEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group. Please visit {3} to learn more about GMM.
The synchronization job for group {0} with Id: {1} has been disabled.
If you would like to have it re-enabled please reach out to {2}.
The group sync will be PAUSED until your response is received.
Regards, GMM Team

data.name: SyncStartedEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group, {0}.
GMM onboarding is requested by {4} to systematically manage the group membership based on the pre-set rules. Please visit {3} to learn more about GMM.
The group {0} with Id: {1} has started its initial sync.
This is an auto-generated email. Please reach out to the onboarding requestor {4} for any specific questions about this group and reach out to {2} for GMM inquires.
Regards, GMM Team

data.name: SyncThresholdBothEmailBody
data.value:
You received this notification because you are listed as a GMM onboarding requestor or as owner of this group. Please visit {3} to learn more about GMM.
The group {0} with Id: {1} has exceeded the specified thresholds.
{2}
What is Threshold?
The Configurable Threshold is a feature of GMM aimed to protect group membership from drastic changes caused by unexpected reasons such as re-organization, source group reconstruction, etc. It alerts the group requestor that the membership change will go beyond the specified Threshold and provides an opportunity for the requestor to review and confirm before GMM takes action.
This is a default-on feature for all the groups, but you may request to update the threshold number or choose to disable this feature all together. Please note GMM does NOT log the individual member to be added or removed due to PII concerns, so we are unable to provide this information.
Actions needed - Please 'Reply All' indicating what GMM should do about the threshold by highlighting one of the following options.
1. The membership change looks right. Please allow the threshold to be exceeded this time only. 2. The membership change looks right. Please allow the threshold to be exceeded, and update the default threshold to X%. 3. The membership change looks right. I don’t need the threshold check in the future so please disable this feature. (Not recommended) 4. The projected increase or decrease does not look right to me. Please do not allow the sync to exceed the threshold. I will contact GMMSupport to follow up.
The group sync will be PAUSED until your response is received.
Regards, GMM Team

data.name: SyncThresholdDisablingJobEmailSubject
data.value: [THRESHOLD_EXCEEDED] GMM: Synchronization job for group {0} has been disabled.
